price: Anaasε Yɛadi kan ama wͻn nwoma bi a wͻgyina soͻ?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
